Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Regrettable_03>Here we are, working ourselves to the
bone to build things by hand...
Talk_0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Irritation_00>If there's one foe I'll never forget, <sp:5:0:0>it's the
man who cast me from my <clr:0000>Gerudo Desert
hideout<clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0> into these very Depths.
Talk_0031:
Now I live for vengeance. <sp:5:1:0>Both upon
that no-good <clr:0000>Zelda<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:1:0> and upon my
sworn enemy!
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Regrettable_02>We meet again at last!


And don't try to tell me you've forgotten
me—we are bound by fate, you and I!
Talk_0032: <sp:3:0:2:0900><sp:0:2:2:7d00><snd:Pointing_02>That means you,<sp:5:0:0> Link!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>Yes, I know it's you, <sp:5:0:0>even under the mask!
Talk_0020:
And you can just whip them up in an
instant! THAT'S NOT FAIR!
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Talk_01>You know who could've used that power?
<sp:5:0:0>The one we worship and revere—<sp:5:0:0>
<clr:0000>the Magnificent One<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0010: <sp:1:3:4:46000000>I am the leader...<sp:5:1:0>of the Yiga Clan!
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Talk_04>I saw the moment you obtained the
<clr:0000>ancient power <clr:ffff>we've sought for so long!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_0024:
The highlight of all the musty old texts
we've found in this land!
Talk_0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>It <clr:0000>remembers objects you've assembled<clr:ffff>
and can <clr:0000>instantly reproduce<clr:ffff> them...

A long-lost ability from the distant past!
Talk_0014: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>Hear my name and tremble in fear!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_0027:
If we offered it to him, he would have
crushed you and <clr:0000>Zelda<clr:ffff> both...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>But you just walked right up<sp:5:0:0> and
snatched it away!
Talk_0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Well, look at that... The legends
were true!
Talk_0005:
You, too, stranger. Credit where credit
is due.
